name: Towards Gold and Glory
description:
ToGG is a digital adaptation of the tabletop "dungeon adventure"-genre (e.g. Descent and HeroQuest). Designed to be played online, together with your friends.
The game is divided into short independent sessions, which starts with creating a hero, and then fighting your way through a dungeon filled with evil minions.

Planned release is somewhere early 2020 to late 2021.

  • 2-5 players online co-op.
  • Strategic simultanious-turn-based combat.
  • All progression is of 'side-grade' nature, new players can join at any point.
